value:
So, I came out of that divine weapon
of yours, right? Ugh. A disgraceful
way to summon royals!

My retainers are Niles and Odin.
You might find them...odd. But
they're really not bad fellows.

Good work with the patrols. It seems
that the Order of Heroes keeps you on
your toes. Let me know if I can help.

I'm hoping this place maintains a
library. I'd love to pore over books
of this realm—especially its history.

I have mastery over gravity, but I'll tell
you, it's not the best idea to shake a
tree for fruit. What a...mess.

Hello there. I've come to convey
greetings from someone you know
named $Nf.$k$pSo, there you go.

Amazing! Then again, I did work
hard for it.
Any growth is good growth.

Given that, I can hardly call
anyone else a disgrace.

You have my gratitude for giving
me more power.

I am Leo, a prince of Nohr. I hold the
divine tome Brynhildr, which grants
me mastery over gravity.$k$pWith less than a gesture, I have
blasted many a fool to ashes.

I'm not surprised to see you here,
$Nu.
You always seem eager to chat.$k$pEven when I am cold and distant
with you, you check up on me
after battle with a kind word.$k$pAnd that concern and connection
have made me stronger than I've
ever been.$k$pThis isn't something I would
normally say aloud, but you make
me feel valuable—even needed.$k$pThat's why...I want you always to
stay by my side.$k$pI never would have imagined this
when I first got here, but...I feel
as if I could trust my life to you.$k$pArgh, I sound pathetic. I don't
imagine you'll ever let me hear
the end of this, will you?
せやっ！
ほら…
うわっ！
I can take it...
You can't hide from me.
To ashes with you!
Contemptible fool.
May darkness claim you!
What disgrace...
Heh...
Care to chat? I'm always up for stimulating discussion.
I rarely while away the time. But glad to do so with you.
I have achieved mastery over gravity, thanks to my divine tome, Brynhildr.
You'd never guess what vegetable really catches my fancy. Tomatoes.
If you ever see my collar inside out, please tell me. Not that it ever happens.
Where are Niles and Odin? Those two, always gallivanting off...
I'll expect clear orders in battle. Ugh, I'm sorry. I know you're on top of things.
Yes?
Ready.
All right.
